name: Verband der Diagnostica-Industrie
membership:
VDGH is full member of MedTech Europe
VDGH is corporate member of the german chemical Industry association (VCI)
goal: VDGH is an industry association for the promotion of common interests of its members. VDGH groups together 100 member companies that manufacture and sell in-vitro-diagnostics and life science research products. Membership is open to all companies who are headquartered in the European Economic Area.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
EU Regulation on In-vitro-Diagnostica IVDR 2017/746
EU Regulation on Medical Devices MDR 2017/745
